description: Will there be fewer Dark Angels this time? No, no there won’t. Greg is hooting and hollering just off screen. Anyway, we have had some regretable technical issues that have prevented Lowest of Men from accessing the juicy, juicy content, so you’ve got me, Wings again for a late column. You will be pleased to know that […]
title: Competitive Innovations in 10th: Night of the Living Deathwing pt.2

description: The Unified Tournament Circuit is a regional circuit for Warhammer 40k and Age of Sigmar which covers the area between Virginia and Newfoundland. In case you missed our announcement, you can find it here. You can find the full calendar of UTC events here. Last Weekend’s Events Another week another UTC wrap up. Just a […]
title: UTC Recap and Weekend Preview: August 2, 2024

description: It’s an exciting time to be a Warcry player. With absolutely no warning whatsoever, Games Workshop came in and added allegiance abilities to the entire game in the new Briar and Bone boxed set. We’re calling them “battle traits,” and will be breaking down how each of them works. Many thanks to GW for sending […]
title: Warcry – Battle Traits Review: Grand Alliance Order

description: Stormbringer is a weekly hobby magazine from Hachette Partworks introducing players to Warhammer: Age of Sigmar. In this 80-week series, our intrepid magazine-receiver will be reviewing each individual issue, its included models, and gaming materials. A Premium US subscription was provided to Goonhammer for review purposes. If you want to follow along at home, US […]
title: SRM’s Ongoing Stormbringer Review: Week 35

description: CMON has completed their second ASOIAF campaign for a new skirmish version of the ASOIAF: TMG. ASOIAF Tactics spans across multiple eras of George R. R. Martin’s world, where previously their game was restricted to the War of the Five Kings. One thing that is lacking from the campaign is an introduction to the characters […]
title: ASOIAF Tactics – King’s Landing Initial Review Part One, The Blacks

description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back with another monthly stats update! He goes over all the global tournament stats for Kill Team, covering all major factions from their winrates, tournament wins, podiums and more! Time to see how the June balance dataslate has really effected the game! Have any questions or feedback? […]
title: CYRAC: July 2024 Kill Team Tournament Stats
